mapper.select: select count(tag_id) from eam_asset_status_test where tag_id = #{tag_id}
mapper.update: update eam_asset_status_test set gateway_id=#{gateway_id} ,tag_id=#{tag_id},receive_time=#{receive_time} , electricity=#{electricity}, signalIntensity=#{signalIntensity} where tag_id=#{tag_id}
mapper.select: SELECT count(1) FROM eam_asset_status_test eas LEFT JOIN eam_asset ea ON eas.tag_id = ea.iot_num WHERE gateway_id = #{gateway_id} AND ea.asset_id IS NOT NULL AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM eam_gateway_asset g WHERE ea.asset_id = g.asset_id )

SELECT eas.*, ea.* FROM eam_asset_status_test eas LEFT JOIN eam_asset ea ON eas.tag_id = ea.iot_num WHERE gateway_id = #{gateway_id} AND ea.asset_id IS NOT NULL AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM eam_gateway_asset g WHERE ea.asset_id = g.asset_id ) limit #{startIndex},#{perPage}

SELECT eas.*, ea.* FROM eam_asset_status_test eas LEFT JOIN eam_asset ea ON eas.tag_id = ea.iot_num WHERE receive_time < ( NOW()- INTERVAL 2 HOUR ) AND ea.asset_id IS NOT NULL AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM eam_gateway_asset ega WHERE ega.asset_id = ea.asset_id ) AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM eam_asset_alarm aa where aa.asset_id = ea.asset_id and ( NOW()- INTERVAL 1 HOUR ) < aa.alarm_time ) ORDER BY receive_time DESC

SELECT eas.*, ea.* FROM eam_asset_status_test eas LEFT JOIN eam_asset ea ON eas.tag_id = ea.iot_num WHERE eas.electricity < '3.2' AND ea.asset_id IS NOT NULL AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM eam_gateway_asset ega WHERE ega.asset_id = ea.asset_id ) AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM eam_asset_alarm aa where aa.asset_id = ea.asset_id and ( NOW()- INTERVAL 1 HOUR ) < aa.alarm_time ) ORDER BY receive_time DESC
